languages.text: [Обратиться к собравшимся] "Если вам есть, что сказать — говорите, не бойтесь. Я вас выслушаю".
[Address the group] "If you have things to say — say them without fear. I will listen."
languages.original_text: [Обратиться к собравшимся] "Если вам есть, что сказать — говорите, не бойтесь. Я вас выслушаю".

traits.locale_text: [Address the children] "If you have things to say — say them without fear. I will listen."
[Address the children] "If you have things to say — say them without fear. I will listen."
[Address the group] "If you have things to say — say them without fear. I will listen."
[Address the group] "If you have things to say — say them without fear. I will listen."
[Address the group] "If you have things to say — say them without fear. I will listen."
[Address the group] "If you have things to say — say them without fear. I will listen."

languages.text: [对孩子们讲话] “如果你们有什么想说的话，就大胆地说出来吧，我会听的。”
languages.original_text: [Address the group] "If you have things to say — say them without fear. I will listen."

traits.locale_text: [对孩子们说话] “如果你们有什么想说的话，就大胆地说出来吧，我会听的。”

languages.text: [Dirigirte al grupo] «Si tenéis algo que decir, hablad sin miedo. Os escucharé».
languages.original_text: [Address the group] "If you have things to say — say them without fear. I will listen."

traits.locale_text: [Dirigirte a los niños] «Si tenéis algo que decir, hablad sin miedo. Os escucharé».

languages.text: [集団に語りかける]「言いたいことがあるのなら…恐れずに言うがいい。耳を貸してやろう」
languages.original_text: [Address the group] "If you have things to say — say them without fear. I will listen."

traits.locale_text: [集団に語りかける]「言いたいことがあるのなら…恐れずに言うがいい。耳を貸してやろう」

languages.text: [Die Gruppe ansprechen] "Wenn ihr etwas zu sagen habt, sagt es frei und ohne Angst. Ich werde zuhören."
languages.original_text: [Address the group] "If you have things to say — say them without fear. I will listen."

traits.locale_text: [Die Kinder ansprechen] "Wenn ihr etwas zu sagen habt, sagt es frei und ohne Angst. Ich werde zuhören."

languages.text: [Vous adresser au groupe] « Si vous avez quelque chose à dire, parlez sans crainte. Je vous écouterai. »
languages.original_text: [Address the group] "If you have things to say — say them without fear. I will listen."

traits.locale_text: [Vous adresser aux enfants] « Si vous avez quelque chose à dire, parlez sans crainte. Je vous écouterai. »

languages.text: [Gruba hitap et] "Söylemek istedikleriniz varsa korkusuzca dile getirin. Hepsine kulak vereceğim."
languages.original_text: [Address the group] "If you have things to say — say them without fear. I will listen."

traits.locale_text: [Gruba hitap et] "Söylemek istedikleriniz varsa korkusuzca dile getirin. Hepsine kulak vereceğim."
